amendment.description: To provide additional funds for grants from the Historic Preservation Fund for historically Black colleges and universities, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3447 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5499) To provide additional funds for grants from the Historic Preservation Fund for historically Black colleges and universities, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3447 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
